posts.title: Business Development Intern
description: Developed an efficient, generalized and executable business plan for the PRAYAS Business Model of GYWS which also includes MoU Drafting, proposing financial metrics and working on financial statements.
I was promoted as a super intern for my best performance in the internship.

posts.title: Senior Executive Member
description: Founding Member of UG PRAYAS Team.
Explored and documented various aspects of School Application Project, which is an inhouse innovation of PRAYAS Team to manage schools efficiently.
Involved in the Research and Development of Sponsorship Project, and worked on several channels of fundraising.
Led a team of about 25 people consisting of the freshmen and the Office Staff of PRAYAS.
Event-incharge of SOCH (Intra-PRAYAS Case Study Competition).

posts.title: PRAYAS Coordinator
description: Re-built the structure of PRAYAS with an addition of 3 new teams namely Tech, Design, Marketing.
Co-founded and led a startup named Komcluez Marketing and Consultancy Private Limited.
Trained a team of 7 sophomores for the first-ever Tech Team in PRAYAS and devised a revenue generation model for Komcluez through this Tech Team

posts.title: Web Team Member
description: Responsible for the development and management of Foreign Training Portal 2020-2021 and the international website of IIT Kharagpur.
Working hand-in-hand with the Office of International Relations to organize the events and programs of the International Relations Cell.

posts.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description: Developed the backend and frontend of the website https://www.quantifiers.in/ from scratch.
The whole content of the website is dynamic and the technologies used in developing this are Django, Bootstrap.

posts.title: Full Stack Developer
description: This is a small-scale research group started by a few students of IIT Kharagpur.
I work on the web/android projects received by this organization from their clients.
